metadata.description: The day when the three of will have to part is coming…'Kana Chiba, Yuji Tachibana, and Souma Kamiya are childhood friends. While distantly aware that their time together is coming to an end, Souma gets a girlfriend. Kana is shocked by this… Four friends confused with their changing hearts and bodies. This is their story of adolescence.
metadata.name: All I Think About Is You (Yaoi Manga)
